pages.text: The Decoctive Diffuser is a device that will periodically consume $(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)potion fluid$(/l) to spread potion effects to nearby mobs. Effects granted this way last 1/4 as long compared to a regular potion. It automatically halts operation when no mobs are in its area of effect. At base, the diffuser spreads potion effects in a 9x9x9 area centered on it, which can be augmented up to 15x15x15 using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/area_radius)radial enhancement augments$(/l).

pages.title: Decoctive Diffuser
pages.text: Reagents, namely redstone and glowstone, can be used to increase the duration and increase effect level (up to IV) at the cost of duration, respectively. A single reagent item lasts for 16 operations of the diffuser.
When controlled by redstone, the diffuser will apply potion effects the moment it is turned on, as long as there are mobs in its range. This way, it will always reliably activate when pulsed.
